solutions:
# YOUR CODE HERE

N = int(input())
users = []

for _ in range(N):
    name, rating = input().split()
    rating = int(rating)
    users.append((name, rating))

users.sort(key=lambda x: x[0])  # Sort by name (lexicographical order)

total_rating = sum(rating for _, rating in users)
winner_index = total_rating % N

winner_name = users[winner_index][0]
print(winner_name)
